subject: Add "type": "module" to fix ES module runtime error on Vercel
body:
The TypeScript config outputs ES2020 module syntax but package.json
lacked "type": "module", causing Node.js to load compiled .js files
as CommonJS and fail with "SyntaxError: Unexpected token 'export'".

https://claude.ai/code/session_017Chg9Fvh8hJ94SLg26umaY
title: Add "type": "module" to fix ES module runtime error on Vercel
